author: Charlie Teather
title: 'Hot felon' Jeremy Meeks makes New York Fashion Week debut walking for Philipp Plein | London Evening Standard
text:
'Hot felon' Jeremy Meeks makes New York Fashion Week debut walking for Philipp Plein 
33-year-old Meeks was dubbed the 'hot felon' after his mugshot went viral Tuesday 14 February 2017 12:05 GMT Click to follow Philipp Plein AW17 at New York Fashion Week 1/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Jeremy Meeks walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 2/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW Getty Images 3/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Jeremy Meeks backstage 4/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW Getty Images 5/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Sofia Richie walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 6/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 7/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Lineisy Montero walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 8/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 9/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Jeremy Meeks walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 10/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 11/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Paris Hilton, Olivia Culpo and Nicky Hilton Rothschild Getty Images 12/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Sofia Richie walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 13/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Dilone walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 14/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Jeremy Meeks walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 15/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 16/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 17/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 18/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
A model walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 19/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Jeremy Meeks walks the AW17 runway Getty Images 20/20 Philipp Plein at NYFW 
Philipp Plein briefs models backstage Getty Images 
Dubbed the 'hot felon' when his police mugshot went viral in 2014, Jeremy Meeks made his New York Fashion Week debut last night as he walked the runway for Philipp Plein . 
Having been arrested for possession of firearms and criminal street gang activity, the 33-year-old signed a modelling contract shortly before being released from prison in March last year and is now represented by London model management agency SUPA. 
Putting his well-recognised piercing blue eyes and chiseled jawline on show last night, the married father of three showcased Plein's latest collection at the New York Public Library in front of a star-studded crowd. 
Sitting alongside fashion press and photographers were Madonna , Kylie Jenner and Tyga, as well as Paris Hilton and sister Nicky. 
Walking the runway alongside Meeks was Sofia Richie, Lineisy Montero and Dilone. 
Keep up to date with all the New York Fashion Week news and show reports here More about:
